column4: Matt Damon tackles "fracking" issue in the "Promised Land"
column5: LOS ANGELES The hot-button topic of "fracking" has finally made its way to Hollywood in the new movie "Promised Land " out in U.S. theaters on Friday  with actors Matt Damon and John Krasinski teaming up to further the debate on the energy drilling technique.

column4: Pearson to buy stake in Nook  Barnes & Noble shares up

column4: Sinopec sets up oilfield service arm ahead of listing
column5: BEIJING  Dec 28 China's Sinopec Group  the parent of Sinopec Corp  has set up a giant oilfield service arm to expand its global engineering and construction services for the upstream oil and gas business and which the state energy firm hopes to eventually list.

column4: CNOOC sees Nexen deal closed in first quarter at earliest
column5: BEIJING China's CNOOC Ltd  said on Friday it expects its $15.1 billion takeover of Canadian oil and gas producer Nexen Inc  to close in the first quarter of 2013 at the earliest  a move that could be aimed at giving U.S. regulators more time to approve a sensitive aspect of the deal.
